definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Bu4 lai2 ke4 shi3 mi4 si1

sentences.english: Mr. Smith, a very white man, but a very yellow one.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生是位忠实可靠的人，但他很胆怯。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith steeps himself in ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯沉湎于古代史中。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith was succeeded by Mrs. Jones as treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯夫人继史密斯先生任会计。

sentences.english: The coach substituted Smith for Jones.
sentences.chinese: 教练让史密斯上场，换下了钟斯。

sentences.english: I'd like to make an appointment with Professor Smith. Would 9:00 tomorrow be all right?
sentences.chinese: 我想和史密斯教授约个会面时间。明天9点行吗？

sentences.english: The Smiths got treatment at half the cost.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯家花了一半的费用得到了治疗。

sentences.english: It is my pleacertain to welcoming Mr. Smith to we company.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴欢迎史密斯男士到咱们自己搞来。

sentences.english: Dr. Smith, we have to go.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯博士，我们要走了。

sentences.english: A: Hi, Mrs Smith, this is Yang Guang. You interviewed me a few days ago.
sentences.chinese: 你好，史密斯女士，我是杨光，几天前你面试过我。

sentences.english: Elly:Yes, Mr. Smith. And we're very much interested.
sentences.chinese: 是的，史密斯先生，我们对此很感兴趣。
约翰斯的大脑，史密斯的躯干。

sentences.english: Smith also designed a special needle and a needle sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯也设计了一个特殊的针和一个注射针研磨器。

sentences.english: They were listening to an expert who is in charge of meteorites at the Smithsonian.
sentences.chinese: 他们在听专家讲解，她是史密斯松宁主管陨石的专家。

sentences.english: B. Smith is a 26-year-old single mother with a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯是一个有一个女儿的26岁的单亲妈妈。

definition: Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
